Adachi sat in his cell, desperately trying to fight off his boredom. He tried to fight off the boredom that had plagued him ever since he came to the worthless town of Inaba. The only respite he ever got from his boredom was when he was graciously given the power to force people inside a TV, with their anguished faces serving as Adachi's only source of joy. Though, it was that power that put him in this situation, imprisoned on several charges such as murder. It only served to magnify his boredom in the long run.

The former detective sighed as he laid back against the wall of his cell. What he wouldn't give for another chance to spice up his life. Eventually, he'd probably go insane from the boredom. There wasn't a single thing in this prison that he could use to entertain himself. All he could do now was fantasise about good food that he could no longer taste. He had truly hit rock bottom.

As he sat there, wallowing in his misery, he noticed a guard approach his cell door before opening a small hatch and hurling a small box through it towards his head. Barely dodging it as it collided with the wall, he looked at the guard suspiciously.

"Sent in as a gift for you. Don't get your hopes up, we already checked it and there's nothing useful inside. I don't know what loser would want to give you a gift, though" The guard remarked, an arrogant smirk plastered on his lips before he quickly left.

Adachi's gaze then turned to the white box that laid next to him. Holding it up, he couldn't find a trace of any designs or text on it; it was a plain, white box. Satiating his curiosity, he opened the box to reveal a small piece of paper and what looked like a remote control - though it's button layout seemed bizarre and alien. Confused by this gift, he opened the folded piece of paper that accompanied the remote. Reading through it, it seemed to be a set of instructions for the device and outlined the absurd functions it supposedly had: body swapping, shapeshifting and possession. It was simply ludicrous; these things just don't exist in the real world. Some nut-job must've sent me this either as a prank or because they're schizophrenic He thought, shaking his head. However, a small voice in the back of his head was telling him to try it. After all, he had the power to enter TVs - did body swapping seem that outlandish compared to that? His curiosity continued to build and build as he thought about it. If it did work, this could be the opportunity he was waiting for, something to spice up his life again and help escape from his drab cell.

He decided to begin with a small test. If the note was correct, the possession function would turn him into a ghost that would be invisible to others. A perfect, discrete trial. Holding up the remote to himself, he pressed the possession button and suddenly felt weightless.

He looked down to see that he was floating above his own body, now a translucent ghost. So it does work Adachi though as he smirked. Looking down at his body, he watched it lay against the cell wall, sighing in boredom without the remote. It seemed that, while he was using the possession function, his body would act on its own, alleviating him of worry. With his test concluded, he flew back into his body as the remote reappeared in his hand.

This is perfect. Maybe there is a god if I've received this. he though as he began to formulate his escape plan. Obviously, he couldn't escape in his own body and would need to use the remote to take another. Neither shapeshifting or unaware swap would work as he'd still be in the cell, leaving only possession and aware swap as his only two options.

If he used possession, he could simply leave the jail as a ghost and then freely take any body he wanted and continue his spree from there as his body kept up an act to deceive the guards.

If he used aware swap, he could switch with a guard and leave in their body, leaving the guard to rot in jail as him, which would be hilarious.

15533333323333322111121.content:
Reyn, Dunban, and Shulk were spending the day crafting gems at colony 9. They had plenty of battle coming up and they knew they needed to be ready. Sharla, Melia, and Riki were taking this day to relax and cool their nerves.

As Shulk and the others took a break from crafting the gems, Reyn noticed something strange on the ground. It was some weird metal device with buttons, and under it was what appeared to be a manual. Reyn was cautious in his approach, for all he knew this could have fallen off one of the mechon when they attacked the colony weeks ago

Picking up the device he saw 4 buttons labeled 'A', 'U,' 'S', and 'P'. "What in the blazes in this?" He asked himself. Just examining the remote would get him no where. He picked up the small manual that was on the ground with it and began reading

The text seemed to be a set of instructions on the device's functions. The 'A' button performed what it referred to as an 'Aware Swap,' in which two individuals targetted by the remote would exchange bodies. The 'U' button performed a similar function, called an 'Unaware Swap,' in which two people would exchange bodies but other people would be made unaware of the change - treating the affected as they normally would. The other two functions worked differently. The 'S' button stood for shapeshift and allowed the target to take on the form of anyone, provided that the activation was preceeded by targetting the desired form with the button. The 'P' button stood for possession and turned the target into a ghost, invisible to others and able to take over the bodies of other individuals.

"What a load of rubbish" Reyn said aloud. There was no way this thing could do something like this. However the more he thought about it the less strange it seemed, mechon technology and the stuff he had seen in Alcamoth all seemed impossible to him. Maybe he should just try it out?

The question was, on whom? The first thing to come to mind was to use it on some of the people who hadn't been gem crafting right now. Melia and Sharla insisted they be given a day to relax and Riki has joined them, but Reyn was bitter about being left with the work even if he was willing to do it. Becoming one of them and getting to relax himself would be nice.

Reyn gave it some more thought and chose to...
15533333323333322111121.title: Reyn

choices: Use the Aware Swap function on Melia
Use the Possession function on Melia
155333333233333221111211.content:
Reyn's initial instinct, and the choice he went with, was to use the remote on Melia. She got to spend the day relaxing while he, Shulk and Dunban soent the day doing hard graft in making these gems. Plus, she was a crown princess - probably got to spend most of her days relaxing in Alcamoth. Reyn deserved some of that relxation too!

Reyn wasn't sure what function to use on Melia, though. He could use that 'Aware Swap' function to take her body and put her in his. That way, She'd be the one doing the hard graft for the day while he relaxed. That'd serve her right!

Reyn's other option was to use the 'possession' function. Melia was a smart girl so putting her in his body might backfire on him. If he possessed her, his own body would act as if nothing was wrong and do the work for him while he relaxed as the crown princess, with the others being none the wiser of his scheme.

Which option did Reyn choose?
155333333233333221111211.title: Swap with Melia

Reyn could swap himself with Riki. That way he could relax for the rest of the day while Riki would have get to work making Gems in his body. That'd be a right laugh! Though, he wasn't sure if he wanted to become a Nopon himself. Plus, with Riki in his body and with knowledge of the swap, that could be disastrous. Who knows what he'd get up to?

There was also the option to use the remote to swap someone else with Riki, maybe one of the other guys. That way, the little furball would have to get to work with Reyn himself watching over Riki. Riki would have no way of learning about the remote that way. Though, Reyn wouldn't be able to relax that way. He'd still have to continue working on making gems and, even if he was willing to do this work, he'd still enjoy taking some time to relax.

15533333323333322111122221.content:
Note: This takes place post-Galahad Fortress

The Party were currently on the Fallen Arm, helping out the Machina residents with their issues while making preparations to proceed further into Mechonis field. After a long day of helping the Machina, the High Entia crown princess, Melia Antiqua, was taking a solitary walk across a mechon-free beach beneath the starlit sky - a reminder of her home. With their current looming task of stopping Egil and the news of a Bionis Allied Force, these breaks were becoming all the more necessary.

Taking a seat upon the white sand, Melia stared out across the endless ocean as she processed her thoughts. Shulk had reunited with his childhood friend, Fiora, and Melia was happy for that. Fiora, herself, was someone who Melia was quickly developing a friendship with - much to her surprise. However, with Shulk and Fiora reunited, Melia also began to feel another emotion. She felt a sadness at this, as if Shulk himself had become lost to her.
Am I jealous of Fiora? No, these feelings shouldn't matter. Shulk and Fiora are happy. I should focus on our impending task of stopping Egil and aiding my brother. Melia thought to herself.

These thoughts came to a halt when Melia noticed something gently bobbing in the ocean waves before her. Approaching it out of curiosity, she found a small white box about the size of two homs hands. She picke it up and opened it, revealing a smaller, rectangular shape within. She removed this object and examined it. Its pure white colouration reminded her of the technology at home but also of the Faced Mechon that Fiora had been piloting prior to their meeting. Upon the device, where four buttons labelled 'A,' 'U,' 'S' and 'P.' What a strange device. Is this some form of forgotten Mechonis technology. Perhaps I should have Shulk analysis. Though, should I bother him with this at such a time? Melia thought, contemplating the situation. It was then that she noticed writing on the inside of the box. Focusing her attention on it, she began to read.

The text seemed to be a set of instructions on the device's functions. The 'A' button performed what it referred to as an 'Aware Swap,' in which two individuals targetted by the remote would exchange bodies. The 'U' button performed a similar function, called an 'Unaware Swap,' in which two people would exchange bodies but other people would be made unaware of the change - treating the affected as they normally would. The other two functions worked differently. The 'S' button stood for shapeshift and allowed the target to take on the form of anyone, provided that the activation was preceeded by targetting the desired form with the button. The 'P' button stood for possession and turned the target into a ghost, invisible to others and able to take over the bodies of other individuals. The remotes functions seemed outlandish and impossible so Melia almost immediately dismissed it as false. However, the Monado did allow Shulk to see the future and Telethia could read people's minds so was such a phenomena really that impossible. Melia, strangely, felt compelled to believe that the device was the genuine article.

Her next thought was how to use it. With such a device, she would need to think carefully about how she used it before she created too many issues for herself.

She could use the remote on Fiora to spend more time with Shulk. Indulging myself this once shouldn't be too severe. She justified to herself. Though she didn't want to admit, she did want to spend time with Shulk more and this remote gave her the perfect opportunity.

However, she could also use the remote to visit Alcamoth briefly. The remote said that her body would act as normal without her with the possession function so no issues would arise from that. There was already a false Melia taking her place in the capital so would one more have such great consequences? She could borrow a citizen's body to visit her brother while she was there.

Which option did Melia Antiqua choose?
15533333323333322111122221.title: Melia

choices: Tell Fiora and use the aware swap function
Keep the remote a secret and use the possession function
155333333233333221111222211.content:
Melia couldn't deny her feelings, even more so with the device in her hand. She wanted to spend more time with Shulk and to do that, she would need to become Fiora. That only left the question of which function to use to achieve that goal. Fiora was stuck in a mechon body, different to her previous Hom body. Perhaps she should divulge the remote to her and use the aware swap function to give Fiora Melia's own body. That way, Fiora could have a body that was closer to her original self - even if the body in question was only half-homs.

However, that would mean divulging the device's existence and Melia wasn't sure if that was the best option. If Fior accidentally told someone else of the remote and it got into their hands, it could lead to chaos. Melia did trust Fiora but they hadn't know each other for long, so she couldn't be too sure. If her feelings of doubt grew too great, she could simply use the possession function to take over Fiora's body while leaving her own to act on auto-pilot. It would minimise the chances of someone else finding out about the remote but it did feel cruel to take over Fiora's body forcefully.

Which function did Melia decide on?

1553333332333332221111.content:
Neku said, "Listen Shiki Reaper Creeper isn't working. Maybe this pin can let us interact with them in some way. We don't have much choice Shiki."

Shiki sighed, "I.. I guess you're right. I just hope it works or else the Noise is going to keep coming."

Neku activated the Pin and both him and Shiki felt a pulling sensation at their souls. Suddenly they found themselves floating in mid air with their bodies below.

Neku heard a female voice, "Neku! What happened to us?"

Neku looked towards the voice and saw a girl with brown hair and glasses dressed in a green jacket and white shirt and ran long skirt.

Neku said, "Shiki? Is that you? But you look nothing like yourself in the UG."

Shiki frowned, "Yeah...my body was my entry fee. I was given another body to play the game. Can..we please not talk about it? Why are we ghost and why is our bodies still acting like nothing happened?"

Neku said, "No clue but we seem to have turned into ghost or something. The pin showed a figure floating towards another person. I wonder...."

He floated towards the girl with light brown hair and felt a pulling sensation to her body.

He fought back the urge and broke free, "It was pulling me to her body. Can we possess people? If so...maybe I can take over her body and then leave the area. The mission was to clear the Noise in Spain Hill. We move them away from Spain Hill the noise is gone."

Shiki gasped, "Neku we can't steal other people's bodies! It isn't right!"

Neku said, "You got any better ideas Shiki? Reaper Creeper isn't working. Im going for it."

He flew into the light brown haired girls body and felt himself sink inside it. He felt physical again and looked at his smaller hands. He muttered, "It actually worked."

The other girl said, "Ai I swear I'm not dating Makoto!"

Neku said, "Prove it then."

The girl went to pull some tickets to the slam off from her bag. She showed them to 'Ai' and they had Ai and Makoto's name on it.

Mina said, "See I got these tickets for you."

Neku took them and said, "Thank you but you should have told me."

Mina said, "I'm sorry I wanted to surprise you!"

Neku sighed, "Well I guess I'll take them and ask Makoto to go with me."

Shiki flipped her player pin and saw the noise had dissapeared. Did their bodies eliminate them?

She smiled it had worked and unintentionally got too close to Mina and possessed her body.

Shiki said, "It worked Neku! The noise seem to be gone. Awesome work!"

Neku smiled, "Guess the gamble worked. Wait if the mission is complete then...

Suddenly Neku and Shiki felt dizzy.

Meanwhile the game master observed this. That pin made them complete the mission in a way they weren't supposed to. Plus that possesion ability could be used as an escape from the UG. They had to be punished.

He smirked as he planned.

The next day Neku and Shiki woke up in scramble crossing but something was different.
